name: Blast Off! - Retro Rocket Jump to Space
name_original: Blast Off! - Retro Rocket Jump to Space
description:
Earth will soon be destroyed. Inter-continental wars, famine and disease have engulfed the planet. Without a new home, earth’s inhabitants will not survive much longer! It’s your job to search for new planets that can sustain life. Travel through the asteroid belt, using stars as boost, and collect golden coins to unlock new rocket ships.

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Steampunk Blast Off! – Retro Rocket Jump to Space’ Now!!!

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this function.
